SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[VeicoliNormativeEuro] ( [VeicoliNormativeEuro_Ky] tinyint IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_Descrizione] varchar(20) NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_UserInsert] int NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_UserUpdate] int NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_UserDelete] int NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_Ecoincentivi] bit NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_Ordine] tinyint NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_Attiva] bit NULL , [VeicoliNormativeEuro_Predefinita] bit NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[VeicoliNormativeEuro] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_VeicoliNormativeEuro PRIMARY KEY ([VeicoliNormativeEuro_Ky])
